product_name: Innersense Organic BeautyI Create Volume Styling Gel
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackInnersense Organic Beauty's I Create Volume Styling Gel is a clear styling lotion for volume and body.
details: DetailsBenefitsEnhances VolumeFullness and ExpansionAdds manageability and shineKey IngredientsHoney and Aloe Vera to lift roots and boost volumeRice Amino Acids and Eucalyptus for fullness, expansion and to add shineFormulated WithoutPhthalatesEthoxylatesSulfatesSilicones1,4 dioxaneParabensPetro compoundsPropylene and butylene glycolPEGMEATEAMIAEDTA artificial dyesSynthetic fragrancesItem 2572244How To UseTake a deep breath and become centered. Section wet hair and distribute pea size amount, raking with fingertips from roots to ends. Diffuse or air dry to define texture or blow dry smooth.IngredientsWater, Aqua- EAU, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Gel*, Cyamop-sistetragonolobus (guar) gum* sorbitol, sclerotium gum, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Water*, Organic Rooibos African Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract* Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Calcium Gluconate, Potassium Sorbate, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Glycerin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract*, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract*, Aspalathus Linearis Leaf Extract*, Eucalyptus Globulus Extract*, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Honey Extract*, Linalool+.*Certified Organic+A natural component of essential oilsShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Take a deep breath and become centered. Section wet hair and distribute pea size amount, raking with fingertips from roots to ends. Diffuse or air dry to define texture or blow dry smooth.
ingredients: Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Water*
Organic Rooibos African Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract* Gluconolactone
Linalool+.*Certified Organic+A natural component of essential oils

reviews.headline: Greasy clothing stains
reviews.comments: This product has ruined many of my shirts.  It leaves grey greasy stains that NOTHING will take out.  I contacted the company and they are aware of the issue and said they have a warning not on the bottle but ony their own website.  If you still want to use it put a towel over your shoulders when air drying.

reviews.headline: Perfect for fine hair!
reviews.comments: As a fine haired curly girl, it is tough to find a product that doesnt weihht my hair down  and give me crispy curls - especially gels! Best gel out there, ill never use anything else.

reviews.headline: The BEST
reviews.comments: It's honestly the best if your hair gets weighed down easily. the curly hair specialist i go to recommended it and I'll NEVER use another gel

reviews.headline: yes.
reviews.comments: ive been getting back on my natural hair journey and this product gave me wonderful volume. most products i have tried weighed my hair down and didn't really emphasize my curls but this did the absolute opposite.

reviews.headline: For sleeker look
reviews.comments: This was a gift with purchase and so glad it was! I use it specifically for taming an updo and frontal baby hair.  I dont feel that it would work for me to curl my hair.  I love it because it takes a minimal amount for the look I want.  It's a bit sticky on the fingers, but nothing a hand wash won't solve.  The small amount lasts all day, without needing hairspray.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love it!

reviews.headline: I would continue to buy this product!!!
reviews.comments: This product helps nurture my hair! It's best yet with less harmful chemicals!!!!

reviews.headline: Not sure if I would buy again.
reviews.comments: Not impress!! It gave some frizz control but did not give me any volume.

reviews.headline: No volume
reviews.comments: This didn't add any volume to my hair. After blow drying, my hair felt dry and crunchy. I used it in very wet hair, as instructed by my hairdresser. Glad I only bought a travel size because this is a disappointing product.

reviews.headline: My Favorite Product
reviews.comments:
I have mixed curls- mostly 2b-2c. Most curl products weigh my hair down with oil, or create a hard, crunchy cast. This is the only product I've found that both defines my curls and doesn't leave them feeling crunchy. Theres no smell- no overwhelming and sickening coconut! It has left my hair much healthier than any other product I've used. 

If you find it's not holding out in humidity, I'd suggest adding the volumizing mousse on top.

reviews.headline: Creates Static
reviews.comments: If you are looking for volume, this isn't it. This should be renamed "I Create Static" because that is all it did for my hair. I have also tried the foam and the same thing happened, very disappointing. I was hoping to find a replacement for Aveda since it is easier to run to Ulta to get what I need, but I will stick with what works.

reviews.headline: Skin Irritation
reviews.comments: I have longer hair and when I use this product  my neck gets super red, burning, itchy. Ive used it a few years ago no problem, so I'm guessing something changed in the formula

reviews.headline: Love this clean product
reviews.comments: On wash days. On soaking wet hair.

reviews.headline: Awesome volume!
reviews.comments: Its really light, goes a long way! gotta be careful not too pour too muchðŸ˜¬

reviews.headline: Holy grail for me
reviews.comments: I tried this after reading the description online. It has some hold but once my hair is dry I can just move it around a little and the crunchiness is gone. I get like 3-4 days of good curls with just a little refresh. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: In the minority, but I hate this product. I have fine, thin cirls. I really struggle to find products that work for my hair. It feels very heavy in my hair no matter how much I use. A few hours in and my hair felt dirty. I dont think it gave me volume as advertised and how I had hoped. My curls were still flat. I'm not expecting a miracle, but I expected some volume. The stylist used it at my hair appointment because she felt maybe I was doing soemthing wrongâ€¦ I still did not like it. Still no volume, flat, and dirty. This is the second Innersense product that I've used and I won't be buying anything from them again.

reviews.headline: Highly recomend
reviews.comments: I love this for my son's hair. It doesn't have a smell, or it's a light smell. It absorbs so well and u don't need a lot. My son has a lot of hair and he loves volume, this gives definition and looks hydrated.

reviews.headline: Will buy again!
reviews.comments: I tried this on its own and with I Create Hold and really liked it. I have to experiment with it some more to find the right amount and concoction for my hair but it's worth the effort because these products have made my hair so soft and healthy.

reviews.headline: Doesn't seem to do much?
reviews.comments: Other than providing some nice slip, I haven't noticed that this product does anything for my hair.  It has no hold for me and I definitely haven't noticed any increase in volume with using it. I have fine wavy hair.

reviews.headline: Staple of my curly routine
reviews.comments: My curly cut hairstylist recommended this product 3 years ago, and I have been repurchasing since! I have 2c hair. A bottle lasts me around ~4-5 months. When I wear my hair curly, I apply a half dollar sized amount to wet hair and scrunch. It works best when my hair is still dripping wet. It does not leave a cast but has the slightest bit of hold. In the summer, I pair it with I Create Hold to control frizz. I also started combing it through wet hair before blowing out to create more volume.

properties.name: Cons

values.label: Hair looks dirty and dull quickly.

display_values: Hair looks dirty and dull quickly.

properties.name: Describe Yourself

values.label: Colored hair and into natural products

display_values: Colored hair and into natural products

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Adds shine and manageability, smells great

display_values: Adds shine and manageability, smells great

faceoff_positive.comments: I am absolutely in love with my Innersense products! I use the Daily Conditioner as a leave-in and use I Create Volume. I use the Color Awakening Hair Bath for shampoo. I Create Volume has the perfect balance between hold and volume - I don't like a lot of crunch to my curls, so it's perfect. It's more of a curling jelly, but leaves my hair soft and bouncy (I see why it was sold out for so long). My hair has never lasted for more than 1 day only using 2 products until I tried Innersense. I also noticed that my Day 1 curls are on point and get better throughout the week (I refresh on Day 5 and have wash day on Day 7). With other products, usually my Day 2 & 3 curls are best). I followed the steps from my hairdresser and still in shock. These products LOVE water, so my stylist showed me how to properly emulsify the products to proper add to my hair (and you save product!). I have been natural for about 5-6 years now and my friends and family have noticed a difference in my hair. I have Type 3C/4A hair, low porosity, and fine hair density. I have tried almost every popular curly hair product and Innersense wins easily. If you know how to apply the products properly, it's a smart investment. I have had my products for almost 3 months now and I still have more than half the bottle from the Hairbath and Daily Conditioner (regular size). I ordered the max. size of I Create Volume because it's popular and I can tell it will most likely last the year.
faceoff_positive.headline: In Love

faceoff_negative.comments: I thought I really like this product. It creates beautiful curls and really nice volume on day one and 2, but I ran out Of my trial size and while I was waiting for my order of the larger size to come in I realized that using different products I was able to get better results on the third and fourth day. If you like to wash your hair every other day or even every day and this is a great product but after two days my hair starts to look dull and dirty and it starts to feel dry and crispy. I don't get that same result with other curl activator's or curl creams so I think I am going to ditch this which is a bummer because I have almost an entire brand new large bottle of it. It does smell really nice. It's a very light scent and doesn't give me a headache.
faceoff_negative.headline: Hair looks dull and dirty quicker.
